core:helpCommand.fullText: Enter the Infinity ‚ôæÔ∏è /howto - I will show you nice usecases of me /start - Restart the bot or return to main menu /menu - Show the main menu with clickable buttons /journal_chat - Have a conversation with your journal AI /new_entry - Create a new journal entry immediately /history - Browse your past journal entries /settings - Customize notifications, UI language & more /cancel - Exit current operation (for the commitment-phobic) /reset - Same as cancel but sounds more dramatic /help - You're reading it now!
